description: Retrieve all secrets in your project

data.description: Data is the array of secret items

created_at.description: CreatedAt is the ISO8601 timestamp when this secret was created

created_by.description: CreatedBy is the identifier of the user who created this secret

description.description: Description is a human-readable description of the secret's purpose

id.description: ID is the unique identifier for this secret

last_updated_by.description: LastUpdatedBy is the identifier of the user who last updated this secret

name.description: Name is the name/key of the secret

object.description: The object type, which is always `secret`.

updated_at.description: UpdatedAt is the ISO8601 timestamp when this secret was last updated

object.description: The object type, which is always `list`.

summary: Get the list of project secrets
